attributes.action: carry out a full investegation in to the Scottish governments cover up, with regards to the Hollie Greig case
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: "In the October 2009 print edition of the UK Column, we reported in our article “BBC Hides Truth of Girl’s Sexual Abuse Ordeal” the shocking ordeal of [a girl with Down's Syndrome], Hollie Greig, who was horribly abused by an Aberdeen paedophile ring, over a period of ten years. After investigating and planning a documentary, the BBC abruptly dropped the case, despite admitting that Hollie was a reliable and accurate witness. It is important to stress that both the police and qualified medical experts have described Hollie as a competent and entirely honest witness.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
